description: A prestigious medical school is trying an unusual way to teach young doctors to be more observant. ARW assistant producer […]
contentencoded:
A prestigious medical school is trying an unusual way to teach young doctors to be more observant. ARW assistant producer Suzanne Pekow reports.


For more on this program and to see photos, visit our tumblr.
